templates.content: Our rings will not turn your finger green. We guarantee it! Our rings are made of high-quality materials ranging from 925 Sterling Silver, to tungsten carbide (the actual materials are listed in the product descriptions). You don't have to worry about your ring rusting or your finger turning green like cheap costume jewelry does.
templates.name: Will your rings turn my finger green?

templates.content: Our rings are made from conflict-free materials. We don't support inhumanely mined diamonds, which is why we use high-quality diamond simulants. Diamond simulants are man-made stones (AAAAA grade cz) that look just like a perfect diamond and shine like crazy.
templates.name: What are the stones made of?

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at hello@modgents.com or give us a call at 800-619-7078. Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Customer support

templates.content: All our rings are made true to U.S. standard ring sizes. We recommend getting your finger sized at a local jeweler. You can also do a quick Google search to find ring sizing methods available online. Just make sure you measure based on U.S. standard ring sizes. Also, if you order the wrong size, don't worry, we've got you covered as we offer hassle-free returns and exchanges. ðŸ˜‰

templates.content:
It's natural to be skeptical. Society has programmed us to spend a fortune on all things wedding related. The reality is, you shouldn't have to spend a ton of money on a symbol of love. Our rings are hand-crafted, beautiful, affordable, backed by a Lifetime Warranty and a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. 

We use alternative materials ranging from 925 sterling silver to tungsten carbide to keep prices lower without sacrificing quality. For more information about how we're different, check out this link: https://modgents.com/pages/why-us If you're still skeptical, check out our reviews from our happy customers here: https://modgents.com/pages/reviews
templates.name: Why are your prices so low? Are the rings real?

templates.content: Once your return package has been received, we please ask that you allow our returns department 2-4 business days to process and send your refund confirmation email. Once processed, it will take your bank roughly 3-5 business days to display the funds in your account. Please note that Shop Pay refunds may take up to two weeks to be received back to your bank account.
templates.name: How long will it take before I receive my refund?
